body:
Hey guys, I get an error using the PMV comfort tool. I have used it several times in the same script but for this specific geometry it won't work. The Traceback is to a check of the terrain. Is there anyone that can help fix this?   Thanks a lot /Christian Error: Runtime error (ValueErrorException): need more than 3 values to unpack
Traceback:
line 572, in checkTheInputs, "<string>"
line 660, in script

replies.body: Hi Christian, There is nothing of wrong with your file, you should just update your LB version. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cBbGZa6zIu4-Spm762zw6rMV2qttdUY1nlcUwdcZrABEbX21qa3y4GcI6th8DesQvgt1ywa2o8olijNCUB2unW3LdLvfgcup/simulation_.png) The problem is the version of LB you are using. Take a look here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cBbGZa6zIu5O034Qp-fMtGxxo6QBuk6M8HvXrM9KDNi-ioWzPWkHktW5sZXWYlgMl4oBPa7eyglSew6aO*5Nbe1qO0hLND4Q/simulation__.png) too many values to unpack.. Best Antonello
